A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Upping my personal movie rating score to out of 5 stars now to match RT. Almost a perfect Star Wars movie\, except for one character's trip to a planet mid-movie that seemed to slow things up. The stakes have never been higher in a Star Wars movie\, keeping you on the edge of your seat\, and a completely unpredictable movie as well. I wouldn't say twists\, that implies the story makes a complete 180 turn\, just that the story doesn't go the way we've been trained to expect blockbuster movies to go ... and that's a very good thing. Very good performance by Mark Hamill\, while love seeing Daisy Ridley as Rey.
